title: Friedrich Merz - Wikipedia
snippet: Ahead of the 2021 German federal election, Patrick Sensburg, Merz's successor in his seat in the Bundestag, failed to secure his party's support for a new candidacy.

title: Friedrich Merz und die Konrad-Adenauer-Stiftung: Die nächste Machtprobe für den Kanzler - DER SPIEGEL
snippet: Wer führt künftig die CDU-nahe Konrad-Adenauer-Stiftung? Friedrich Merz schlägt Unionsfraktionsvize Krings vor. Doch der hat zum Ärger des Parteichefs eine prominente Gegenkandidatin.

title: New German Chancellor: Bundestag elects Friedrich Merz
snippet: In a second ballot the Bundestag elects the CDU leader as successor to Olaf Scholz. ... Berlin (dpa) - The Bundestag has elected CDU leader Friedrich Merz as Chancellor of the Federal Republic of Germany in the second ballot.

title: The Turbulent Times of Friedrich Merz - The New York Times
snippet: The new chancellor believes the world needs a stronger Germany. He is still navigating how to do it. Friedrich Merz, the German chancellor, in June in Washington.Credit...Kenny Holston/The New York Times

title: Friedrich Merz puts Germany in an unfamiliar position: Out front – POLITICO
snippet: Breaking from his dithering predecessors Scholz and Merkel, Merz is playing an unusually active role as the defender of Ukraine and Europe as a whole. Friedrich Merz has taken a far more active stance inside the EU — assuming a role more traditionally played by France's now weakened President.
